subject: Some reversals
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Reverse speech works for EVP too. See reversespeech.com Hyphon is a
non-human entity that talks sometimes, mostlyu with EVPmaker. Merry
Christmas!

 Frank-S

Re e se speech wo ks o EVP oo. See e e sespeech.com Hyphon is a non-human en i y ha alks some imes, mos lyu wi h EVPmake . Me y Ch is mas!
 
 F ank-S
